channel.title: Very simple question, just cant find it
channel.description: im trying to change the logout timer. if i go idle for about 45 seconds or maybe even 30 it logs me out. its quite annoying, and i'd like to make it longer. i went to a file searcher with my source im using, and typed "logout", but nothing came up with numbers that looked right. i also did that with the client but im pretty sure its source-sided. any ideas where to look? thanks. im going to keep looking and ill check back soon.

item.title: Very simple question, just cant find it
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:10, topic:359111”]Has to be declared outside of a method.
Search for

public class Client extends Player implements Runnable {

And declare it below that.[/quote]

okay…see this is my first time, and ive only been editting things, not really adding things. when i have more time and im really serious about making a real server, i’ll start completely blank almost and work my way up. this is only for one or two other friends so im just editting something. thank you everyone for the help!! you’re all jesus miracle makers

Read full topic

so guess who feels more retarded because
1:i didnt declare it rofl
and 2:theres still one error i cant get >.<

client.java:10267: illegal start of expression
public int idleTimer = 0;
^
1 error
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Very simple question, just cant find it
item.dc:creator: @me_caveman me caveman
item.description:
@me_caveman wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:6, topic:359111”]Idling is a packet.

case 202:

If you want to make it longer, you could declare an integer

public int idleTimer = 0;

Than replace case 202 with this.

case 202: if (idleTimer < 5) idleTimer++; if (idleTimer == 5) logout(); break;
That would make idle logout five times longer than normal.[/quote]

okay, i feel really retarded and stupid right now.
this is what i got from the compiler.

client.java:10267: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable idleTimer
location: class client
if (idleTimer < 5)
^
client.java:10268: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable idleTimer
location: class client
idleTimer++;
^
client.java:10269: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable idleTimer
location: class client
if (idleTimer == 5)
^
3 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
item.source: Very simple question, just cant find it

item.title: Very simple question, just cant find it
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Idling is a packet.

case 202:

If you want to make it longer, you could declare an integer

public int idleTimer = 0;

Than replace case 202 with this.

case 202: if (idleTimer < 5) idleTimer++; if (idleTimer == 5) logout(); break;
That would make idle logout five times longer than normal.

Read full topic
